title: One Of Google Maps' Best New Features Is Finally Available On IOS
text:
Screenshot: Brendan Hesse

iOS users who prefer Google Maps over Apple’s Maps app or even Waze will finally have access to one of the best features from the Android version: the ability to submit live traffic reports.

Despite being available on Android for a few months now, the traffic report feature has been absent on the iOS version. But as of today, the latest update to Google Maps on iOS will finally let iPhone users ping car crashes, congestion, speed traps, and more in real time, directly on the map.

How to submit Google Maps traffic alerts on iOS
